text: hananim-i geudaeege malhanonijunimkkeseo ingandeul-eul ewossago iss-eumyeo hananim-i geudaeege boyeojun geos eun baegseongdeul-eul siheomhagi wihaeseola ttohan kkulan-e issneun jeojubad-eun namu do geuleohageoneul hananim-i geudeul-eul dulyeobge hayeoss-euna geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun omanham-eul deohal ppun-ideola
